name: Soccerdile
description:
Controls:

If you want to switch between full screen and windowed mode hold Alt and press the Enter key

Once in game you can use WASD to move the camera

The scroll wheel zooms in and out to so you can find a distance that is comfortable to play at

Q and E will rotate the camera

You can select a crocodile by hovering over them and clicking the right mouse button or by using the number keys. Using the number keys will also move the camera to the selected croc's location which can be extremely useful in emergency situations.

With a crocodile selected you can click the left mouse button anywhere on the pitch and they will begin to run directly towards that point regardless of what may be in the way.

You can also hit the Space key and your selected crocodile will open their mouth. However be warned they can't really see once their mouth is open and so will automatically snap it closed when they detect something in front of them regardless of what it is

Rules:

Being eaten by a crocodile is bad for your health and will result in death

If the ball is eaten, a new one will spawn at the centre of the map. This can be used to your advantage in several ways.

The crocodile who kills another player or pops the ball will first be given a yellow card as a warning. Upon doing it a second time they will be given a red card and removed from the game.

If all crocodiles on a team are dead or removed from play a new team of replacement crocodiles will appear and the opposite team will be given 1 point.

If a goal is scored both teams will have all of their missing players replaced and a point will be scored.

Just like with real soccer the first team to reach 5 points will be declared the winner.
